author: Hannah Bleau, Hannah Bleau
title: Watch: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis Defends Deeming Churches 'Essential'
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis (R) defended deeming churches as "essential" in his stay-at-home order, telling reporters during Thursday's press conference that the government does not have the authority to close a church and adding that they play an important rol…
